sense.def:
The edge of something
je prostor ali črta, kjer se nekaj ustavi in se začne neka druga stvar.

seg.quote: Little children played at the water's edge.

sense.def:
The edge
je daljša stran ploskega, tankega predmeta.

Kadar je nekaj
edged with a particular thing
, ima neko stvar ob robu.

seg.quote: ...a beautiful garden edged with flowering trees.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with or without
OBJ,
with
ADJUNCT

sense.def:
To edge somewhere
ali
to edge one's way there
pomeni zelo počasi se nekam pomikati.

seg.quote: He edged away from the thug.
I edged my way to the window.

sense.def:
Če so ljudje
on the edge of an event
, se bo neki dogodek verjetno kmalu zgodil.

seg.quote: The world had been brought to the edge of war.

sense.def:
To be on edge
pomeni biti tako živčen, da se ne moreš sprostiti.

seg.quote: The prospect was setting his nerves on edge.

sense.def:
To have an edge over someone
pomeni imeti pred nekom prednost.

seg.quote: Europe's edge over the rest of the world became marked.
